function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Cancellation of ad hoc events, travel restrictions, home quarantine, dissemination of fake news","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"60% reduction in transmission if not quarantined within 1 day from symptom onset, social distancing based on degree of pragmatism","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated walk-in clinics, inadequate training for medical workers, lack of specialized infrastructure, inadequate testing and surveillance, lack of case isolation, insufficient visitor controls, inadequate ppe exchange and disinfection","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate medical facilities, poor communication, lack of encrypted communication for top management","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on prevention and security keywords in research studies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High transmission capacity of covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate bibliometric analysis of research keywords","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited research in critical areas related to disease control and outbreak management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate knowledge and understanding of infection risk factors based on age, gender, and location of the population","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited research on drug efficacy, safety, and antibody response","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large number of researchers in proximity increases the risk of contagious disease spread within the research community.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of cloud-based tracing and tracking framework may involve data privacy and security risks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contingency approaches and protocols for pandemic management may lack effective implementation and adherence.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of loan waivers and liquidity programs cases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for pandemic outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring and surveillance of contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on community-centered treatment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of quantity in technological advancements for medical field during pandemic outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for interdisciplinary collaboration in handling the crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on factors influencing ppe production, distribution, and
